type.name: file_alias_identification_item
type.description: This select extends the assignments of identification for aliasing to external files.

entity.name: File
entity.description: A File is one of potentially more files on a computer system or in actual stacks of paper that make up a Document_definition. Each File is a Hardcopy or a Digital_file.

explicit.name: id
explicit.description: the unique identifier of the external file.

explicit.name: version
explicit.description: optional version of the external files.

inverse.name: idalias
inverse.description: alternate identifications of the external file

unique.label: UR1
unique.description: The id of the external file shall be unique.

entity.name: Hardcopy
entity.description: A Hardcopy is a type of File. A Hardcopyb is the actual stack of paper consisting of one or more sheets, on which some product data is written, printed or plotted.

entity.name: Digital_file
entity.description: A Digital_file is a type of File. A Digital_file contains computer interpretable data.
